author: terencechain
content: Hello. Do you know if the coinbase bootnode is up? Trying to sync beacon node to debug some issues.

author: inphi
content: I'm not aware of any CB bootnodes. But the other bootnodes for the devnet 1 are up.

author: terencechain
content: Ah. I was still using the old bootnode. Just got the new one. Thanks!
